attributes.action: help students stay in college while on JSA
attributes.additional_details:
As a single mother in part time education, and claiming  JSA, I am absolutely disgusted that I am expected to leave my college course in order to be pushed into a job, (of which there are few) with minimal pay. Yet on completion of my course, I would stand a greater chance of work, due to more experience, and even may wish to start my own business. The government should help those who go into education to better themselves, and not to restrict them.
Please sign this epitition, and tell your friends. This needs to change. This is wrong!
